string-array.name: amphitheater
string-array.item: In the basement of the Arena di Serdica Hotel you can see these remains partially exhibited. The building was built at the end of the 3rd-early 4th centuy AD on the ruins of the ancient Greek theatre type building, dating from the 2nd century AD.
Address: 2 Budapeshta Str., Sofia (Click to see on the map)
